movies.title: Golden Swallow
movies.plot: The indomitable martial arts team of director Chang Cheh and stunt choreographer Liu Chia-liang continues the compelling saga of Golden Swallow from King Hu's Come Drink with Me in this sequel of heartbreaking romance, jianghu intrigue and stunning action.
movies.simplePlot: The indomitable martial arts team of director Chang Cheh and stunt choreographer Liu Chia-liang continues the compelling saga of Golden Swallow from King Hu's Come Drink with Me in this ...

biography.bio: Pei-Pei Cheng was born on December 4, 1946 in Shanghai, China. She is an actress and producer, known for Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon (2000), Lilting (2014) and L'hirondelle d'or (1966).
biography.name: Pei-Pei Cheng

biography.bio: Yu Wang was born on March 28, 1944 in Wuxi, Jiangsu Province, China. He is an actor and producer, known for Master of the Flying Guillotine (1976), Dragon (2011) and Dragon Flies (1975). He was previously married to Jeanette Lin Tsui.
biography.name: Yu Wang

biography.placeOfBirth: Pematang Siantar, Oostkust van Sumatra, Dutch East Indies [now Pematangsiantar, North Sumatra, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Born in Indonesia to Cantonese parents, Lo migrated to Hong Kong in his teens, where he attended acting school and in 1962 joined the Shaw Bros. film company. By 1969 he had become the first kungfu superstar, preceding the legendary Bruce Lee. He acted in more than 100 films, usually cast as villains, then turned to directing in the 1980s. For over a decade ending in 1999, Lo was involved in television work in Hong Kong, until failing health forced him into semi-retirement.
biography.name: Lieh Lo

biography.bio: Hsin Yen Chao was born on February 2, 1941 in Shandong, China. She is an actress, known for The Bells of Death (1968), Golden Swallow (1968) and Hong la jiao (1968).
biography.name: Hsin Yen Chao

biography.bio: Wu Ma was born on August 18, 1942 in Tianjin, China as Hung-Yuan Feng. He was an actor and director, known for Histoire de fantômes chinois (1987), Once Upon a Time in China (1991) and Miracles - Mr. Canton and Lady Rose (1989). He was married to Ma Yan. He died on February 4, 2014 in China.
biography.name: Wu Ma

biography.bio: Chih-Ching Yang was born on February 11, 1919 in Hubei, China. He was an actor and assistant director, known for L'hirondelle d'or (1966), Vengeance (1970) and L'ombre enchanteresse (1960). He was married to Yan Hua Chen. He died on April 30, 1984 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Chih-Ching Yang

biography.bio: Pin Ho was born on July 20, 1917 in Shaoyang, Hunan, China as Ho Wo-sung. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Vengeance (1970), Golden Swallow (1968) and Duel of the Iron Fist (1971). He was married to Lai Wang. He died on December 11, 1981 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony.
biography.name: Pin Ho

biography.bio: Kang Liu was born in 1949 in Malaysia. He is an actor, known for La rage du tigre (1971), Chinese Vengeance (1973) and Golden Swallow (1968).
biography.name: Kang Liu

biography.bio: Miao Ching was born on March 13, 1913 in Shandong Province, China. He was an actor, known for Shi er jin pai (1970), Le sabreur solitaire (1969) and Chinese Vengeance (1973). He died in 1989 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Miao Ching

biography.bio: Ti Tang is an actor and writer, known for Bruce Lee and I (1973), The Anonymous Heroes (1971) and Golden Swallow (1968).
biography.name: Ti Tang

biography.bio: Feng Ku was born on July 3, 1930 in Shanghai, China as Szu Wen Chen. He is an actor, known for The 36 Crazy Fists (1977), La vengeance de l'aigle de Shaolin (1978) and A Chinese Ghost Story II (1990).
biography.name: Feng Ku

biography.bio: Wei Lieh Lan is known for his work on Golden Swallow (1968), L'ombre enchanteresse (1960) and The Bells of Death (1968).
biography.name: Wei Lieh Lan

biography.bio: Kau Lam was born on January 1, 1923 in Guangdong, China. He was an actor, known for Drunken Master (1978), As Tears Go By (1988) and Biao jie, ni hao ye! (1990). He died on October 30, 2009 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Kau Lam

biography.bio: Chia-Liang Liu was born on August 1, 1936 in Guangzhou, Guangdong, China. He is known for his work on The Legend of Drunken Master (1994), Legendary Weapons of China (1982) and Seven swords (2005). He was married to Jing-Jing Yung and Hsiu-Hsia Ho. He died on June 25, 2013 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Chia-Liang Liu

biography.bio: Mars was born on February 28, 1954 in Hong Kong as Wing-Fat Cheung. He is known for his work on Project A (1983), Police Story (1985) and Project A 2 (1987).
biography.name: Mars
